subject_terms_3: Indian National Army (Singapore) Indian National Army Monument Site periodicals
physical_appearance: This clipping is a page from the periodical 'The Orient Illustrated Weekly' published on 26 May 1946. This page includes a list of donor names and a part of an article in the center column. The columns on left and right includes eight advertisements. The edges of the page are slightly torn, especially at the top. There are several small tears in the middle of the page.
title_text: The Orient The Orient I. N. A. Fund
